TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Siapaluway, title = Siapaluway, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Siapaluway} }

S.FORM: alang Siapaluway ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Shoufeng, kwara sali buwan nya ga 191 buwan, 437 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 69% kyan ku 300 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 31% kyan ku 137 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 66%, Truku 1%, Tayan 3%, binah lihuyan s'uli 4%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Siapaluway hya' ga bsilung. tay 'zil na Siapaluway hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Siapaluway hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Siapaluway hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Siapaluway hya' ga Sililasay. tay 'llaw na Siapaluway hya' ga Tumay. tay 'zil na Siapaluway hya' ga Adetuman. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Siapaloway ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Shoofeng, kwara sali bowan nya ga 191 bowan, 437 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 69% kyan ko 300 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 31% kyan ko 137 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 66%, Troko 1%, Tayan 3%, binah lihoyan s'oli 4%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal psato tegami ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Siapaloway hya' ga bsilong. tay 'zil na Siapaloway hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Siapaloway hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Siapaloway hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Siapaloway hya' ga Sililasay. tay 'llaw na Siapaloway hya' ga Tomay. tay 'zil na Siapaloway hya' ga Adetoman. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
